title: Visual Bug with Omega Squad Twitch
body:
I was playing omega squad twitch with a tahm kench (urf skin).
what happened:  Tahm devoured me at the same time i started activating 
my Q to stealth and when he spat me out i was visually stealthed for the rest of the game.
according to my team mates i was stealthed even though enemies could see me.

replies.body: Whoa, thanks for the reports! We're looking into this right now and will fix it ASAP.

I have the same issue playing with Omega Squad Twitch. My duo partner is a consistant Tahm Kench player, and when he eats me while I'm stealthed it always seems to occur. For the rest of the game, even through death and respawn, Twitch will be glowing green with the huge AoE circle denoting his stealth range which makes him way too noticeable to the enemy team, even when I'm not in stealth mode.
